## HTTPResponse.json() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
json(): Promise<any>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

Promise which resolves to a JSON representation of response body.

## Remarks

This method will throw if the response body is not parsable via `JSON.parse`.
